feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 08:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -24.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -29.9°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
